channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Poland's official channels Trump as he hails £300m 'big and beautiful' border wall
item.description: A Polish minister said "hardly anybody" gets through the fence which stretches for 116 miles.
item.author: James Knuckey

media:content.media:description: Polish border guard soldier along the 116-mile fence

item.title: Texas floods: 13 dead and summer camp children missing
item.description: Some of the children at a summer camp are feared to have been caught in the flooding.
item.author: Alice Scarsi,James Knuckey

media:content.media:description: Men survey damage left by the floods as the search continues for those missing

media:thumbnail.media:description: Men survey damage left by the floods as the search continues for those missing

item.title: Tourist-hating protesters humiliated as Brits keep flocking to their beaches
item.description: British tourists numbers rose in May as German and Spanish visitors steered clear of the Balearic Islands.
item.author: Chris Samuel
item.media:keywords: Tourism, Majorca, Protests, British tourists, House prices, Balearic Islands, majorca, spain, balearic islands, britons, brits, uk, may, travel, numbers, Brits, tourism, protests, Brits in Majorca, Tourism protests, Balearic Islands tourism, Housing

media:content.media:description: The Balearic Island countinues to be a major draw for British tourists.

media:thumbnail.media:description: The Balearic Island countinues to be a major draw for British tourists.

item.title: Spanish holiday hotspot set to cook in 50C heatwave and that's just the shade
item.description: Even in the shade temperatures could hit a baking 50C.

item.title: Majorca protesters humbled as 'nothing will break Brits' love affair' with the island
item.description: Not even anti-tourism marches, sweeping regulations and increased hostility can deter Brits from Majorca.

item.title: 'I visited Tenerife and I couldn’t believe 1 thing - I'm never coming back to the UK'
item.description: A holidaymaker said the UK "no longer makes sense to him" after a startling discovery when visiting the island in the Canaries.
item.author: Katie-Ann Gupwell,Chris Samuel
item.media:keywords: Spain, Tenerife, TikTok, tenerife, spain, travel, canary islands, price, cost of living, tiktok, brit, briton, holiday, holidaymaker, spanish, Tenerife cost of living, UK affordability, TikTok reaction, Spanish salaries

item.title: Gas workers stumble upon 1,000-year-old mummy - but they're not in Egypt
item.description: Gas workers digging beneath a major capital city stumbled upon a 1,000-year-old mummy, almost on the opposite side of the world from Egypt.
item.author: Emily Wright
item.media:keywords: Archaeology, Peru, South America, Pre-Inca burial, Chancay culture, Archaeological discovery, child burial, Incan Empire, utility workers, 1000 years, seated position, brown hair visible, huarango tree, tomb marker, ceramic plates, Lima rich history

media:content.media:description: Gas workers digging beneath Lima, Peru, stumbled upon a 1,000-year-old mummy.

media:thumbnail.media:description: Gas workers digging beneath Lima, Peru, stumbled upon a 1,000-year-old mummy.

item.title: Iran must not trade a turban for a crown – why 'Baby Shah' is not the answer
item.description: Iranians face a nightmarish existence and they deserve the freedom that we enjoy here in the West.

media:content.media:description: Iran deserves better than this son of a dictator

item.title: Germany seeks extraordinary deal with the Taliban in bid to boot out Afghan migrants
item.description: Berlin is seeking a deal with Kabul which would see Afghans convicted of crimes in Germany being sent back to Afghanistan.

item.media:keywords: Germany, Afghanistan, Taliban, Migrant Crisis, Germany news, Germany migrants crisis, Afghanistan news, Afghanistan latest,
